verses.verse: Then I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H7549>see,<s%> in the expanse that was over the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> there <S%H7200>appeared<s%> above them as it were a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H3678>throne.<s%>

He <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H906>linen,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the whirling <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> even under the <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> both your <S%H2651>hands<s%> with <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> and <S%H2236>scatter<s%> them over the <S%H5892>city.<s%> He went in as I <S%H935>watched.<s%>

Now the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the right <S%H3225>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> when the <S%H376>man<s%> went <S%H935>in;<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> mounted <S%H7311>up<s%> from the <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and stood over the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and the <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

The <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> even to the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> as the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> when he <S%H1696>speaks.<s%>

It came to <S%H6680>pass,<s%> when he commanded the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from between the whirling <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> from between the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> that he went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> a <S%H212>wheel.<s%>

The <S%H3742>cherub<s%> stretched <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from between the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> to the <S%H784>fire<s%> that was between the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> of <S%H5414>it,<s%> and put it into the <S%H2651>hands<s%> of him who was <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> who <S%H3947>took<s%> it and went <S%H3318>out.<s%>
There <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> the <S%H8403>form<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> under their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H702>behold,<s%> four <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H3742>cherub;<s%> and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> was <S%H5869>like<s%> a <S%H8658>beryl<s%> <S%H68>stone.<s%>
As for their <S%H4758>appearance,<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> of them had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1823>likeness,<s%> like a <S%H212>wheel<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> a <S%H212>wheel.<s%>

When they <S%H3212>went,<s%> they <S%H3212>went<s%> in their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>directions:<s%> they <S%H5437>didn't<s%> turn as they <S%H3212>went,<s%> but to the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> they <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H5437>it;<s%> they didn't turn as they <S%H3212>went.<s%>

Their whole <S%H1320>body,<s%> and their <S%H1354>backs,<s%> and their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels,<s%> were <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> even the <S%H212>wheels<s%> that the four of them <S%H702>had.<s%>
As for the <S%H212>wheels,<s%> they were <S%H7121>called<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing,<s%> the whirling <S%H1534>wheels.<s%>

Every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces:<s%> the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> was the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> was the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> face the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle.<s%>
The <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> mounted <S%H7426>up:<s%> this is the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar.<s%>

When the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> beside <S%H681>them;<s%> and when the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> to mount <S%H7311>up<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H1992>also<s%> <S%H5437>didn't<s%> turn from beside <S%H681>them.<s%>

When they <S%H5975>stood,<s%> these <S%H5975>stood;<s%> and when they mounted <S%H7311>up,<s%> these mounted <S%H7426>up<s%> with <S%H7307>them:<s%> for the spirit of the living creature was in <S%H2416>them.<s%>
The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> from over the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> over the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

The <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and mounted <S%H7426>up<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%> when they went <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> <S%H5975>them:<s%> and they stood at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was over them <S%H4605>above.<s%>

This is the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> under the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that they were <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

Every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces,<s%> <S%H259><s%> and every <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>wings;<s%> and the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> was under their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

As for the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> they were <S%H1992>the<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> which I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar,<s%> their <S%H4758>appearances<s%> and <S%H3212>themselves;<s%> they went every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5676>straight<s%> <S%H6440>forward.<s%>
